website_summaries.verdict: A perfect protein powder to throw into a blender to fuel workouts.
pros: Chocolate flavor is outstanding, and also comes unflavored
cons: May clump if not mixed in a blender

customer_reviews.title: My face looks full again!! 😍 I can tell it's working from the inside out. Dissolves great IF you use a Blender!
customer_reviews.text: WOW - I'm doing the Keto lifestyle, and I've been using this for +3 weeks now and I've seen a huge difference in my skin and facial volume. I also run and my joints overall (knees) haven't been bothering me so much. I mix 1 cup of So Delicious Unsweetened Organic Almond milk with cashews, a heaping scoop of this + 1.5 tap of MCT oil and have that for breakfast or lunch. It tastes GREAT! I still can't rave enough about my skin clarity and what seems to be volume coming back in a healthy glow kind of way. I can tell it's working from the inside out. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bone broth protein I've tried, and my go to every morning! I really appreciate the natural ingredients, which 0 sugar and 0 carbs. I struggle with stomach pain and lots of bloating... drinking this once a day has made a dramatic difference in my gut health. (And it really does make my stomach bloating go down which = a more flat tummy.. always a good thing in my book). I 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My body functions best with beef
customer_reviews.text: I've been using another popular bone broth in my smoothies for the past year. My body functions best with beef, and I love that Nature's Property, has only grass-fed beef in its protein powder. What I was the most surprised with Nature's Property pure unflavored bone broth, was the taste, even using two dates as a sweetener, the other brand still had a slight 'meaty' aftertaste, which isn't great in a fruit smoothie. Nature's Property tastes great and is my new favorite, as it has a very pleasing and delicious flavor. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Snack and Protein Drink
customer_reviews.text: I love this! At first I was hesitant because I like another peptide protein drink. Now that I’m drinking it consistently I feel sooo good. It can clump easily so I usually warm up water in a blender bottle and shake it up. Mixes well. Gives me energy and the protein that I need without the heavy protein feeling. I am leaving on a trip and am sad I forgot to bring it with me!! Recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Best feeling protein that I've found
customer_reviews.text: I like how this protein makes me feel much better than previous proteins I've used (whey and vegan). I feel like it helps repair my muscles 10 times better and helps me power through the muscle fatigue wall that I hit towards the end of my workout. I recommend this unflavored version that mixes well with my berry-green drink smoothie. Literally the best way to intake protein that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Almost no taste I already see a difference on my face (skin) just feels tighter. My only complaint; it’s really really really sticky and messy when it’s wet. Seriously it becomes difficult to control. Keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product offers many benefits as outlined in the product description. The taste is good. The problem I have with it is that it does not mix well with a spoon or shaker. I have to use an electric mixer. Although its is a pain, I will continue using this product as I like the benefits and I need a dairy free product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This is the best protein supplement on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein supplement on the market. I've tried all sorts of different products but this is super clean and tastes delicious (Hard to get both). My body feels fantastic. The soreness that I felt in my ankles and knees from running is gone. I highly recommend this product! Buy it now. You won't be disappointed. One tip, use a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I’d reorder again
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues when i use my ninja blender to make a protein shake. This is my second time using a bone broth protein so I was aware after my first purchase of its distinct taste. But I’ve come to love avocado protein shakes, and I can’t taste the bone broth flavor at all. I’m not very big on fruity protein drinks so I’m not sure how they taste with the protein in it.
customer_reviews.author: alisha corden

customer_reviews.title: Best taste out of any other bone broth protein powders.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands of bone broth protein shakes and this one by far taste the best. All I do is mix it with some unsweetened almond milk and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Mix it right
customer_reviews.text: Really works well with frozen bananas and water, put your fruit in first then liquid then the powder then a little more liquid. I feel the difference taking this too. Will be ordering again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like it compared to other collagen products I have purchased. It was sort of sticky and didn't dissolve very easily even in warm liquid. There wasn't a bad flavor and it did mix up in a smoothie, but I don't think I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stejskal

customer_reviews.title: I like this protein
customer_reviews.text: I like this protein. It is a bigger jar than some of the other brands. The taste is good and I like that it is made from grass fed cows.
customer_reviews.author: Matson

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: This protein is amazing! I use it everyday and it's very versatile since it's unflavored. I've used it in smoothies, soup, and even hot chocolate! It mixes well and you really can't taste it. The health benefits of this are a huge reason why I love it. It works perfectly with my gluten and dairy free lifestyle and the ingredients all meet my high standards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good but I can't get it to mix without huge clumps. I've used a shake bottle with metal ball whisk, an actual whisk, a fork, and a blender. Nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Alteran_Tech

customer_reviews.title: Same product different look.
customer_reviews.text: I'll take a pic. This batch of bone broth is white compared to the other 2x that I purchased it. I'm scared and dont know whether to trust this batch or not.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmjoww_J

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This was ok. Ended up returning. Had to be really careful about when I added this in the blender to avoid clumping. Mostly had to just stop and scrape down the sides to get it to mix in. A little sweet for me
customer_reviews.author: Cheekybugger2017

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This is some great protein powder. Just what I wanted: bone broth protein powder without any of those sweeteners that other ones have. It really has no taste which is great for me because I can add in fruit and veggies and not worry about a sweet taste from the protein. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I loved this! I have a protein shake every day ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this! I have a protein shake every day after working out, and this was a great replacement for my whey protein shakes. I have heard awesome things about this superfood, and I’m excited to keep going. Even after the first smoothie, I just felt better inside. Definitely worth the purchase, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amount in container
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the amount in the container. I can’t be certain it has the correct amount but the container was only about 3/4 of the way filled if that much. I like it but just don’t think I’m getting what I’m paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Allison C.

customer_reviews.title: Helping my skin look better and really taking advantage of what Bone Broth can ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pushing up near 50 now, I can feel my joints are weakening, my gut is a little bigger and less active and my metabolism is way slower. Chocolate Bone Broth goes right in my daily smoothie to get the full affects of it to help with my aginy body. Helping my skin look better and really taking advantage of what Bone Broth can do for you.
customer_reviews.author: RRHOGGER

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: My spouse and I have loved adding this to our diet. All the benefits of a protein powder, without the negatives. The all natural ingredients are my favorite part. Gives us peace of mind & our bodies have loved us for it. There are soooo many options for protein and I’m glad we found this one- we are customers for life now!
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Judd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I highly recommend because of the many health uses and benefits! It’s gluten free, helps with the stomach, huge for chrones disease. Great for joints and ligaments, and great for hair skin and nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality protein. I have gained several pounds of muscle weight since starting.
customer_reviews.author: Gwbh

customer_reviews.title: Lumps, but tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes really great, but the only way to make sure it doesn’t have clumps is using it in a blender. Shaker bottles don’t cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Lille

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. I only wish it dissolved well enough to use in a blender bottle. You always have to use an actual blender.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Walker

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein powder so far, goes great in my morning shakes and mixes well in my smoothies! I feel like my body reacts so much better to this natural protein than it does to whey. I give this two thumbs up and can’t wait to use it all so I can try the chocolate flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Aste

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered chocolate and it does not taste like chocolate. It tastes like stevia Does not blend well. Tried blender and shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy no lump mixes well
customer_reviews.text: Taste good. I use mine in hot teas. Green tea and mint. Mixes well no foam. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacintha

customer_reviews.title: Zero Carbs and Sugar
customer_reviews.text: Just recently switched from regular whey/soy proteins to Bone Broth Protein and I love it! Zero Carbs, Zero Sugar it doesn’t get any better than that! Been using it in my pre workout morning smoothie and mixes great! Natures Property well done!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy mess!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is fine but it doesn’t disolve!! I’m so disappointed, I have tried many ways to drink this but al I get is a messy clumpy drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was encourage to try this product and I couldn’t be happier. The taste is legit and it seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a long time whey protein guy, not anymore. I was encourage to try this product and I couldn’t be happier. The taste is legit and it seems to just be easier on my stomach. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Hit the spot
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good. The flavor was better than most name brand powders that you'll find in the stores. I got the chocolate cream and it had all the aminos that I'm looking for. Makes a great banana breakfast smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy First-timer!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying Bone Broth Protein! I’ve got to say, I’m super satisfied! I use it every morning after my workout and feel great. The texture is smooth and mixes well, the flavor is rich and chocolates and it sure beats whey. 💯
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Henkel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is unflavored so it can go in anything, mostly my morning shake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chocolate tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this a shot since I've been trying to cut out dairy products such as whey, milk, yogurt, and cheese. The chocolate tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this protein. The taste is excellent! It’s exactly what I was looking for in bone broth protein. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal King

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery every time I order. When I’m looking for quality, healthy protein for my workout routine Nature’s Property Bone Broth is my go to.
customer_reviews.author: Baden Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Tastes AMAZING! It also has a really good texture
customer_reviews.text: Tastes AMAZING! It also has a really good texture! We’ve tried countless different protein powders! For sure my favorite! We made a chocolate protein shake and it was delicious! Can’t wait to see more benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Rodgerson

customer_reviews.title: Product tastes great, price is good too
customer_reviews.text: If you've done your research on the benefits of bone broth, then look no further! Product tastes great, price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best i've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: I was just recently introduced to Bone Broth protein and love it. This is by far the best tasting one i've tried. Great for energy boost too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Landon T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been working out and drinking Protein for years. How did I not know about this stuff?! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camden

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix well
customer_reviews.text: Decent taste, but does not mix well. Chunks always remain on my mixer almost gummed up making it hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tolland

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a number of different protein powders and none of them ever left me feeling good. I found a brand that had a good taste that I could tolerate, but it made me feel bloated and gross all day after. I heard about this protein and was excited to try it because everyone I knew loved it! And they were right! I make a protein shake every day and I honestly look forward to it. This protein powder has also made a huge difference in my training and how my body feels every day. I love it and I don’t see myself stopping it any time soon. Maybe they will even come out with some more flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Meads

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and mixes well. Easy on the stomach!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is delicious and easy on the stomach. Mixes well with water, almond milk, and milk. Due to my ignorance, I was worried that it would have at least some hint of a beefy flavor of some sort because of its bone broth derivative, but I was really off-base. Most protein powders give me a stomach ache or cause some sort of indigestion but not this stuff. I’m really pleased with its nutrient profile and taste. I’ll be ordering this consistently from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Barrus

customer_reviews.title: Best unflavored bone broth ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a restricted died and realized I wasn't getting enough protein. I tried various bone broth powders but they didn't always blend well, there was a texture issue or a slight taste. This bone broth protein is the BEST! No flavor at all, blends in perfectly with all my food and no weird texture. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Has a scent that is difficult to overcome
customer_reviews.text: After trying this collagen powder I will not be ordering it again. It has a scent that is difficult to overcome. It's not that I taste it when put in a shake, but there is an unavoidable odor that makes it difficult to drink. It would be fine mixed into something savory like a soup, but not good at all in a green/fruit smoothie. Also, when I add it before blending, it creates a result that is mostly froth. The only way I can use it and keep the smoothie drink-like is to add it after pureeing the other ingredients and only pulse it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Joy-Filled Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This id addicting! I use every morning in my coffee to give me a boost of protein to start my day. The taste is like hot cocoa!!!! I bought a different brand recently and regret not staying with this one. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't blend well
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it because I can't find any other Collagen + Gelatin combo. But it's really hard to consume this in drinks. They don't blend well and chunks float at the top.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Excellent, Mixes very well!
customer_reviews.text: This product mixes well with any kind of protein shake. Lots of protein in each serving and very good value. I would recommend this to anybody looking to try Bone Broth.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Product was expired!!!
customer_reviews.text: I order this product a week ago and it was expired so I order a replacement thinking that it was a mistake and guess what? Today I got the new one and it expired last month too.
customer_reviews.author: Majo V.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting bone broth protein
customer_reviews.text: Best bone broth protein I have ever tasted. I can really tell this product is high quality. Definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Cutler

customer_reviews.title: It’s only been 4 days
customer_reviews.text: And my skin feels so much more supple like no lie it makes even acne scars look better in 4 days wow I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste D Honea

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My face plumped up in less than a week! My husband said I look 10 years younger...and that's all I needed to hear. I'll definitely be buying more! No taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: Faith42

customer_reviews.title: Love the protien
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the non flavored, it blends great in drinks, and smoothies. It is super smooth when mixed in, I love that it isn't as gritty as some other products out there
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, good energy
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of this, also feel much more energy so far. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Jordan N. Garn

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is literally indestructible, not even a ninja blender can completely dissolve it. I would comment on what benefits I feel after drinking it but I don’t like drinking big clumps of gooey powder. It tastes alright but meh. I don’t know if it’s a bad batch or what but I’ve used other bone broth powders that were “finer” and dissolved easier.
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: is amazing! Not only that it tastes great in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried alot of protein powders and the fact that this one is dairy free, gluten free, paleo friendly and all of the above, is amazing! Not only that it tastes great in my morning organic greens and banana smoothie. It's fabulous! purchasing my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nature’s Property Bone Broth Core Protein Powder Shake - Pure Unflavored | 20 Servings | Vital Collagen Peptides + Gelatin | Gluten Dairy, Egg & Nut Free | Bone Broth Protein Powder
feature_bullets: BEST ABSORPTION Many "bone broth protein" products don't even contain gelatin! They use collagen peptides instead. Ours is the real thing, and contains both, providing superior gut repair.

AUTHENTIC RECIPE: If it mixes easily, it's not authentic! True bone broth protein requires a blender of a shaker bottle to mix, inferior blends use fillers to create fixability. Ours is a bit harder to mix. Your body will thank you.
ENSURED QUALITY: Paleo Friendly, Gluten Free, Nut-Free, Grain-Free, Non-GMO, and No Preservatives. Check out our label to see more.

YOUR HEALTH IS NOT A TREND: We are passionate about the ingredients we put in our product, we likewise are enthusiastic about what we exclude. Nature’sProperty uses all-natural ingredients, containing zero artificial preservatives and no additives. We provide you with only quality ingredients. Most companies use proprietary blends/formulas to get away with low quality ingredients without listing full amounts. We, however only focus on the best. Choosing Nature’s Property is an easy choiceAll

NATURAL BONE BROTH POWDER: With customers being our number 1 focus. We don’t just use the best ingredients. We also make sure our products are created in the best facilities. Our products are made in the USA Ensuring quality in every product.
